prompts.text: What's the best advice you've ever received?
What's something that you've always wanted to try but haven't had the chance to yet?
What's the most challenging thing you've ever done?
Have you ever had a dream that was so weird it stayed with you all day?
What's the most bizarre thing you've ever witnessed?
What is the meaning of life?
If you could create your own utopia, what would it look like?
If you could create a new holiday, what would it be and what would it celebrate?
If you could have a conversation with your past self, what advice would you give?
What's the most interesting place you've ever visited?
What's the most adventurous thing you've ever done?
Hey, I couldn't help but notice your [accessory or clothing item]. It looks really cool. Where did you get it?
Hi, I need your opinion on something. Do you think it's better to go out or stay in on a Saturday night?
Hey, I noticed you're reading [book title]. I've been meaning to read that. Is it any good?
Excuse me, I'm trying to settle a bet with my friend. Do you think [controversial question] or [alternative]?
Excuse me, I'm having an existential crisis and I need someone to talk to. Do you have a minute?
Hey, I'm on a mission to meet the most interesting people in this room, and I think I just found one. Can I buy you a drink and hear your story?
